GS24paninipu:80: na subrahmaṇyāyāṃ svaritasya tu udāttaḥ // PS_1,2.37 //
GS24paninipu:106: tiṣya-punarvasvor nakṣatra-dvandve bahuvacanasya dvivacanaṃ nityam // PS_1,2.63 //
GS24paninipu:108: vṛddho yūnā tal-lakṣaṇaś ced-eva viśeṣaḥ // PS_1,2.65 //
GS24paninipu:171: dāṇaś ca sā cec caturthy-arthe // PS_1,3.55 //
GS24paninipu:183: ṇe raṇau yat karma ṇau cet sa kartā 'nādhyāne // PS_1,3.67 //
GS24paninipu:241: karmaṇā yam abhipraiti sa sampradānam // PS_1,4.32 //
GS24paninipu:314: yuṣmady-upapade samāna-adhikaraṇe sthāniny api madhyamaḥ // PS_1,4.105 //
GS24paninipu:315: prahāse ca manya-upapade manyater uttama ekavac ca // PS_1,4.106 //
GS24paninipu:438: yasmād adhikaṃ yasya ca+īśvara-vacanaṃ tatra saptamī // PS_2,3.9 //
GS24paninipu:535: etadas tra-tasos tra-tasau ca anudātau // PS_2,4.33 //
GS24paninipu:538: ado jagdhir lyap ti kiti // PS_2,4.36 //
GS24paninipu:585: na avyayībhāvād ato 'm tv apañcamyāḥ // PS_2,4.83 //
GS24paninipu:594: dhātoḥ karmaṇaḥ samāna-kartṛkād icchāyāṃ vā // PS_3,1.7 //
GS24paninipu:599: bhṛśādibhyo bhuvy-acver lopaś ca halaḥ // PS_3,1.12 //
GS24paninipu:609: dhātor eka-aco hala-ādeḥ kriyāsamabhihāre yaṅ // PS_3,1.22 //
GS24paninipu:677: kuṣi-rajoḥ prācāṃ śyan parasmaipadaṃ ca // PS_3,1.90 //
GS24paninipu:793: āḍhya-subhaga-sthūla-palita-nagna-andha-priyeṣu cvy-artheṣv acvau kṛñaḥ karaṇe khyun // PS_3,2.56 //
GS24paninipu:1041: karmaṇi ca yena saṃsparśāt kartuḥ śarīra-sukham // PS_3,3.116 //
GS24paninipu:1103: kriyāsam-abhihāre loṭ loṭo hi-svau vā ca ta-dhvamoḥ // PS_3,4.2 //
GS24paninipu:1133: varṣa-pramāṇa ūlopaś ca asya anyatrasyām // PS_3,4.32 //
GS24paninipu:1170: laḥ karmaṇi ca bhāve ca akramakebhyaḥ // PS_3,4.69 //
GS24paninipu:1185: bruvaḥ pañcānām ādita āho bruvaḥ // PS_3,4.84 //
GS24paninipu:1204: yāsuṭ parasmaipadesu udātto ṅic ca // PS_3,4.103 //
GS24paninipu:1296: aṇ-iñor anārṣayor guru-upottamayoḥ ṣyaṅ gotre // PS_4,1.78 //
GS24paninipu:1379: manor jātāv añ-ayatau ṣuk ca // PS_4,1.161 //
GS24paninipu:1383: vā anyasmin sapiṇḍe sthaviratare jivati // PS_4,1.165 //
GS24paninipu:1453: tad asyāṃ praharaṇam iti krīḍāyāṃ ṇaḥ // PS_4,2.57 //
GS24paninipu:1463: tad asminn asti iti deśe tannāmni // PS_4,2.67 //
GS24paninipu:1563: sarvatra aṇ ca talopaś ca // PS_4,3.22 //
GS24paninipu:1607: tasya vyākhyāna iti ca vyākhyātavyanāmnaḥ // PS_4,3.66 //
GS24paninipu:1641: janapadināṃ janapadavat sarvaṃ janapadena samānaśabdānāṃ bahuvacane // PS_4,3.100 //
GS24paninipu:1684: mayaḍ vaā+etayor bhāṣāyām abhakṣya ācchādanayoḥ // PS_4,3.143 //
GS24paninipu:1711: tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam // PS_4,4.2 //
GS24paninipu:1834: tadvān āsām upadhāno mantra iti iṣṭakāsu luk ca matoḥ // PS_4,4.125 //
GS24paninipu:1869: tad asya tad asmin syād iti // PS_5,1.16 //
GS24paninipu:1903: tad dharati vahavty āvahati bhārād vaṃśādibhyaḥ // PS_5,1.50 //
GS24paninipu:1933: tam adhīṣṭo bhṛto bhūto bhāvī // PS_5,1.80 //
GS24paninipu:1949: tatra ca dīyate kāryaṃ bhavavat // PS_5,1.96 //
GS24paninipu:1968: tena tulyaṃ kriyā ced vatiḥ // PS_5,1.115 //
GS24paninipu:2022: inac piṭac cika ci ca // PS_5,2.33 //
GS24paninipu:2025: tad asya sañjātaṃ tārakā-ādibhya itac // PS_5,2.36 //
GS24paninipu:2034: tad asminn adhikam iti daśāntāḍ ḍaḥ // PS_5,2.45 //
GS24paninipu:2066: tāvatithaṃ grahaṇam iti lug vā // PS_5,2.77 //
GS24paninipu:2071: tad asminn annaṃ prāye sañjñāyām // PS_5,2.82 //
GS24paninipu:2083: tad asya asty asminn iti matup // PS_5,2.94 //
GS24paninipu:2197: vibhāṣā supo bahuc parastāt tu // PS_5,3.68 //
GS24paninipu:2221: kiṃ-yat-tado nirdhāraṇe dvayor ekasya ḍatarac // PS_5,3.92 //
GS24paninipu:2249: pādaśatasya saṅkhyāder vīpsāyāṃ vun lopaś ca // PS_5,4.1 //
GS24paninipu:2366: añ nāsikāyāḥ sañjñāyāṃ nasaṃ ca asthūlāt // PS_5,4.118 //
GS24paninipu:2447: vaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ kiti // PS_6,1.39 //
GS24paninipu:2507: na āmreḍitasya anatyasya tu vā // PS_6,1.99 //
GS24paninipu:2682: tavai ca antaś ca yugapat // PS_6,2.51 //
GS24paninipu:2721: arme ca avarṇam dvyac tryac // PS_6,2.90 //
GS24paninipu:2864: striyāḥ puṃvad-bhāṣītapuṃskādanūṅ samānādhikaraṇe striyām apūraṇī-priyādiṣu // PS_6,3.34 //
GS24paninipu:2922: viṣvag-devayoś ca ṭer adry añcatau vapratyaye // PS_6,3.92 //
GS24paninipu:2940: saṅkhyā-vi-sāya-pūrvasya ahnasya ahann anyatarasyāṃ ṅau // PS_6,3.110 //
GS24paninipu:3014: sanaḥ ktici lopaś ca asya anyatarasyām // PS_6,4.45 //
GS24paninipu:3031: sya-sic-sīyuṭ-tāsiṣu bhāva-karmaṇor upadeśe 'j-jhana-graha-dṛśāṃ vā ciṇvad-iṭ ca // PS_6,4.62 //
GS24paninipu:3076: lopaś ca asya anyatarasyāṃ ṃvoḥ // PS_6,4.107 //
GS24paninipu:3125: sthūla-dūra-yuva-hrasva-kṣiprakṣudrāṇāṃ yaṇādiparaṃ pūrvasya ca guṇaḥ // PS_6,4.156 //
GS24paninipu:3127: bahor lopo bhū ca bahoḥ // PS_6,4.158 //
GS24paninipu:3308: acas tāsvat thaly aniṭo nityam // PS_7,2.61 //
GS24paninipu:3368: na y-vābhyāṃ padāntābhyāṃ pūrvau tu tābhyām aic // PS_7,3.3 //
GS24paninipu:3391: ardhāt parimāṇasya pūrvasya tu vā // PS_7,3.26 //
GS24paninipu:3409: pratyayasthāt kāt pūrvasya ata id āpy asupaḥ // PS_7,3.44 //
GS24paninipu:3438: lug vā duha-diha-liha-guhām ātmanepade dantye // PS_7,3.73 //
GS24paninipu:3452: na abhyastasya aci piti sārvadhātuke // PS_7,3.87 //
GS24paninipu:3634: gatyartha-loṭā lṛṇ na cet kārakaṃ sarvānyat // PS_8,1.51 //
GS24paninipu:3694: ekāco baśo bhaṣ jhaṣantasya s-dhvoḥ // PS_8,2.37 //
GS24paninipu:3699: ra-dābhyāṃ niṣthāto naḥ pūrvasya ca daḥ // PS_8,2.42 //
GS24paninipu:3737: adaso 'ser dād u do maḥ // PS_8,2.80 //
GS24paninipu:3743: guror anṛto 'nantyasya apy ekaikasya prācām // PS_8,2.86 //
GS24paninipu:3764: eco 'pragṛhyasya adūrādhdūte pūrvasya ardhasya ad uttarasya+idutau // PS_8,2.107 //
GS24paninipu:3797: ṅamo hrasvād aci ṅamuṇ nityam // PS_8,3.32 //
